text: Colin Philip Lowrie (20 June 1936 - 25 April 2025) was an English stage and television actor. He was best known for portraying the role of Dennis Tanner in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he played from the programme's inception in 1960 to 1968, and again from 2011 to 2014. Lowrie died on 25 April 2025 at the age of 88. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:2025 deaths Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Philip Lowrie
